title: New Events, Brainrots, Mutations & More
highlights: Added Cosmic Bloom / Prismatic Surge / Gilded Awakening events
Exclusive event brainrots and mutations
New plant: Tomatrio, Gear: Frost Grenade

title: Weapons, QoL, Fixes
highlights: Melee weapon added
Auto-collect brainrot cash on pickup
Pity spawn notification

title: Fuse Machine + Potions
highlights: Fuse Machine: fuse plants with specific brainrots for limited-time combos
10 new epic brainrots via the machine
Potions added (shop or random drops)
Inventory shows damage or $/s on click

title: Rebirths Update
highlights: Rebirths enabled + island expansion (2 rebirths)
New plant: Mr. Carrot
Lucky Eggs and Meme Lucky Block
5 new brainrots

title: Minor Balance + Performance
highlights: Adjusted brainrot money/s (halved) for balance
Major lag fixes and performance settings
Rainbow visual lag fixes; Rainbow → Neon rename

title: Minor Improvements
highlights: Restored Seeds/Garden/Sell TP buttons
Hovering over plants shows damage
Fixed mutation not boosting brainrot income
Admin panel finalized

title: Game Revamp
highlights: New map and islands: personal road & brainrots
Place brainrots on platforms for money; buy more platforms
Offline income for brainrots; unified island leaderboard
Economy rebalanced (higher prices as brainrots earn more)

title: Update 1 — Freeze Event & Frozen Mutation
highlights: Limited-time Freeze Event each hour
New Frozen mutation (plants freeze briefly; frozen brainrots immune)
New plant: Carnivorous Plant
4 new brainrots; Lucky Wheel; +25% Money group reward
Quality-of-life: notifications, AFK, seed stock fix, size up to 200x
